resources.string: You can easily get your friend\'s mobile number using this Mobile Number Generator! Ask your friend to take a calculator as he/she have to do some calculations for you. When everything is ready, click on PLAY button.\nIncorrect calculations or step in will lead to incorrect mobile number. So, follow the steps carefully.

Ask your friend to write down 10 digits of his/her mobile number (without first zero) on a paper. It\'s not important, just to make the calculations easy for him/her. Suppose, if the mobile number is 01234-567890, he/she will consider only 1234-567890 (excluding first zero).
